name: Rose And Thorn Tech Demo (UNFINISHED)
description:
Controls: Movement: WASD or left joystick Dash attack: left click or west face button on gamepad Bash attack: right click or east face button Jump: space bar or south face button

I recommend using a game pad.

Full disclosure, this is what happened after about a month of design work from start to finish, give or take a couple weeks. I made this about 5 or 6 months ago. There is no real end state. The boss isn't really fully designed, and the enemies are broken in some respects. I am fully aware this is not good. But, I did the work, so I figured I'd let people mess with it if they really wanted to.

The actual game will eventually come out, I've started a big overhaul since I finished this. Basically, you can expect the actual game to play nothing like this does, but I hope to make it look very similar Credits: @N0THANKY0UMUSIC for the music! @Cru3LJule for the tilesets! Both can be found on twitter!
